description.@en: With alchemical instruments, you have learned to mix Wytchstone into liquid, distilling it into a usable Elixir. However, the risks associated with concocting your Elixirs is severely diminished by your innate know-how.

effect.@en: Immediately after concocting an Elixir, roll D100 three times and pick the one you prefer best. In addition, you never suffer the ill-effects of Critical Failures when preparing Elixirs, instead treating it as a failed Skill Test.
